title: League of Carrys
body:
Just take a look at these consecutive games of league of legends, GOTTA LOVE THE GAME.

What's the secret behind a good team riot, Clearly not being in gold/plat? Riot do you call this teamwork, My team feeding their asses off and I have to 1v5....??? Is there a reason why I should have players with a silver mentality in gold/plat?

When you think elo boosting is under control......

Take a look at these bad boys! GOTTA LOVE LEAGUE OF LEGENDS!
https://gyazo.com/aad48f56ff2af3126203df7100ffa350

https://gyazo.com/6db2fd09aec4359ac4bec2c3e7f6424a

https://gyazo.com/b648d51b32190faadb5ff3912278ed4d

https://gyazo.com/d50aa8f1596a2ce8129b07bbfc2ef9f8

https://gyazo.com/03c5125b1c30d34701d4dba15b3d22db

GIVE MY RANK BACK!!!! THIS IS OUTRAGEOUS!!! Rip the dream boys!

replies.body:
People have bad games once in a while? Shocker.

Go join a dynamic que team full of people that are just as good as you, and play perfectly all the time. EZ solution.
